nodes.text: Nartun Trecim was an Ascendant of Mau who was quoted in Collected Poems, Prayers, and Meditations on the Force, a compilation of material relating to the Force compiled by the Disciple of the Whills Kozem Pel.
Nartun Trecim was first mentioned as part of a chapter quote in the novel Guardians of the Whills, which was written by Greg Rucka and released on May 2, 2017.
